summary: An individual chooses to dress simply and live modestly despite their wealth, emphasizing that external appearances do not define true worth."
A wealthy person remains humble and unassuming, highlighting the importance of character over material possessions."
An individual's continuous pursuit of knowledge and learning underscores the significance of intellectual growth and curiosity."
The individual prioritizes contributing value to society over displaying wealth, illustrating the idea that true success is measured by purpose and impact."
